website_summaries.verdict: A unique shampoo designed for blonde and gray hair to tone down brassiness, it also adds volume and de-frizzes without weighing it down.
pros: A little goes a long way
Designed to use every three washes, alternating with everyday shampoo
Tones hair without drying it out
Users have received compliments on how amazing their hair looks as a result
cons: Unlike many other alcohol-free shampoos, this one does contain sulfates and is not organic
Will not be as effective on brunette or red hair

customer_reviews.title: Surprised

But it worked great making my dirty blonde hair into a lighter blonde. I used both the shampoo and conditioner (I let each set in my hair for 3-5 mins) then I put regular conditioner on my tips because it seemed a bit dry. This is only after one wash so it's possible it might even go lighter after a few more
